verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:19
verses.text: When ye were but few, even a few, and strangers in it.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:20
verses.text: And when they went from nation to nation, and from one kingdom to another people;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:21
verses.text: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:22
verses.text: Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:23
verses.text: Sing unto the Lord, all the earth; shew forth from day to day his salvation.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:24
verses.text: Declare his glory among the heathen; his marvellous works among all nations.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:25
verses.text: For great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised: he also is to be feared above all gods.
